listing.listing_description:
Meaning ‘villa of love and sunshine’ exquisite Rak Tawan provides an abundance of both. Striking oriental architecture lends a charming traditional nature to this hillside villa, while modern touches accentuate the luxurious setting. From the upper terrace, marvel at spectacular sunsets, the enchanting sky mirrored in the resting ocean. Relax, shop or dine in style at nearby Surin beach.

The topaz infinity pool juts proudly over the abundant hillside below, extending towards the dazzling horizon. Float weightlessly above Surin bay, or soak up the tropical sun from the comfort of a poolside lounger. Stroll over to the cocktail bar for a fruity refreshment, and recline with your drink in the shade of the opulent outdoor lounge. Delightful twin massage pergolas reside on either end of the pool, where you can request divine spa treatments while overlooking the sparkling sea.

A tremendously well-equipped gym offers a mix of strength and cardio machines. Inspirational views of clear blue skies and lush green foliage set a magnificent backdrop to your workout.

An eclectic mix of artwork adorns the villa’s walls. From ancient portraits to political statement pieces and pop culture references, you will have fun unravelling the story behind each piece. Simple, comfortable furniture has been thoughtfully chosen to balance with the traditional basis of Rak Tawan’s design. Look forward to mindful mornings on Buddha’s balcony, accessed through a spiritual corridor, lined with vibrant bird of paradise flora. As the sun sinks towards the horizon, retire to the upper lounge – a restful room with broad vistas of Surin bay. A sleek modern kitchen hosts a welcoming breakfast bar and casual dining table. Here your private chef will prepare sensational gourmet meals, a real treat for the taste buds.

Continuing the modern-traditional fusion of style, silky cushions and rich, polished wood are married with modern art and sumptuous king sized beds in the villa’s five bedrooms. Welcome each glorious day from the bedrooms’ wrap around balcony, which doubles as a magnificent view point. Luxurious en-suite bathrooms ensure a totally relaxing bathing experience. Roomy showers are forgiving when you fling your arms wide, mid-song. ‘His and hers’ sinks and inviting deep bathtubs complete the indulgent feel of these rooms.

Sophisticated Surin beach is a pleasant five-minute stroll from the villa. Fine white sands and crystal clear waters create a heavenly spot to relax with a book, or take a refreshing dip. Surrounding the beach you will find exclusive wine bars and high-end restaurants serving up exciting, exotic flavours. Phuket airport is a short 15km drive.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Complete with a walk down to your own private oceanfront lawn, Villa Nagisa has it all. Located on the coast, amongst the lush tropical environment surrounding the Ko Samui Rainforest, this four bedroom luxury home awaits. With ample space for hosting, gorgeous accommodations for all, and an incredible amount of amenities, the only thing more incredible than Villa Nagisa itself, is its ocean view.

Modern Thai architecture mixes clean lines with rustic wood columns and stone to create an elegant vacation home that pays respect to its natural surroundings. The interior is decorated with modern designer furniture and locally inspired art. The terrace is easily accessible from every room that it borders, promoting the flow of natural sunlight and fresh ocean breeze. The kitchen features state of the art appliances and plenty of functional workspace.

Nagisa boasts beautiful dining areas, both inside and out, with space for eight. There’s also bars and sound systems inside and out, so you can take the party anywhere. Once you’re on the terrace, you’ll love the infinity swimming pool, it’s got a few build in stools that face the endless ocean view. There’s also a hot tub, lounge chairs, and plenty of furnished outdoor living space. And, to make life even easier, Nagisa comes with housekeeping, airport transfer, and twenty-four hour security.

Each of Nagisa’s four bedrooms feature a king sized bed, en-suite bathroom, and a private, furnished, terrace. The master comes equipped with a jetted-tub, dual vanity, and a walk-in closet.

You’ve got the oceanfront taken care of, but when it’s time to head to the beach, well, that’s taken care of too. Just a five minute walk from Nagisa and you’ll be on the sandy shores of Samrong Bay Beach. If that’s not enough, there’s two more beautiful beaches within a ten minute drive. If you’re interested in exploring the city, just travel 8 km south and you’ll be in the heart of Main street’s shops, restaurants, and nightlife.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Enjoy a private getaway within walking distance of Surin Beach at Bluesiam Villa. Perched just above the beach, with panoramic sea views, this spectacular Phuket vacation rental is a rare find for its convenient yet tranquil setting. Expansive living areas, resort-worthy outdoor spaces and eleven suite-style bedrooms make the villa ideal for a special occasion with friends, a family reunion or even a sun-kissed destination wedding—and the honeymoon afterward.

After your journey to Phuket, you’ll be welcomed to the villa with champagne and a fruit basket. Step out to sip the bubbly by the infinity pool on the terrace, where plenty of loungers and sitting and dining areas will tempt you to relax a while—and then repeat for the rest of your holiday. In the evenings, heat up the barbecue or gather inside in the home theater or around the pool table.

Fold-away glass walls let you open the terrace to the villa’s great room for one seamless indoor-outdoor living space. The open-concept living and dining areas take their inspiration from both traditional Thai decor and contemporary style, for a mix of pieces such as wicker sofas, graceful wooden chairs and modern artwork. Entertaining is a breeze thanks to a dining table that seats thirty, a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and a wine cellar.

With en-suite bathrooms, lounge areas, private balconies and ocean views, the eleven bedrooms at Bluesiam Villa rival the suites at any luxury resort. There are nine bedrooms with king beds, including four with jetted tubs, and two bedrooms with two twin beds each.

The villa is only a short walk from Surin Beach, where you’ll find oceanfront restaurants and lively beach clubs along the soft sands and emerald waters, and a short drive from other popular beaches such as Kamala, Bang Tao and Patong. Take in a performance at FantaSea, sample local specialties at the area’s many night markets and wander through coffee shops and galleries tucked into heritage buildings in Phuket’s Old Town.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Find your bliss at the breathtaking oceanfront Villa Nandana. Named for the Sanskrit word meaning “paradise,” this four-bedroom luxury Phang Nga vacation rental has panoramic views over the turquoise waters of the Andaman sea and is just a few barefoot steps from the white sands of Natai Beach. Bring the family for a relaxed tropical getaway, use the villa as the setting for an unforgettable destination wedding or make it the backdrop of an ultra-private honeymoon in Thailand.

A chef, a housekeeper and a property manager guarantee your comfort during your stay—and provide daily breakfast. The resort-worthy perks continue with a sprawling terrace with shaded sitting areas and a row of chaise lounges in the sun, an infinity pool, a palm-dotted lawn stretching toward the sea and a private fitness room and spa area. Enjoy the ocean’s bounty hot off the barbecue at the alfresco dining pavilion and share photos of the day via Wi-Fi before retiring to air-conditioned rooms.

Natural finishes and an open-plan (and open-air) layout give Villa Nandana a serene feel that’s in tune with the incredible setting. In the great room, which has glass walls that can be pushed back to let in the ocean breeze, soaring wood-paneled ceilings and a free-form coffee table add drama, while sleek white sofas strewn with cushions are soft and inviting. Mid-century inspired chairs are an unexpected touch in the dining area, but their clean modern lines fit right into the sophisticated space. There’s more richly hued wood paneling to be found in the fully equipped kitchen, along with stainless steel appliances and a generous breakfast bar.

Each of the four bedrooms at Villa Nandana has a king bed, ensuite bathroom and ocean views, and opens directly to the terrace, ensuring that there’s no choice of garden view or pool view on this beach holiday. Vaulted and paneled ceilings make each bedroom feel like its own pavilion, and mod lounge chairs give you an extra private space to relax.

Thanks to the villa’s location on Natai Beach, only a few steps lie between you and the sun-kissed sand. Take the car to explore Ao Phang Nga National Park, 40 km away, play a round at Red Mountain Golf Course, 60 km away, do some shopping or enjoy a meal in Old Town Phuket, just over 63 km away, or experience the vibrant nightlife on Bangla Road, about 76 km away. When your vacation is over, make your connection from Phuket International Airport, a 30 km drive from the villa.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
An infinity pool stretches the length of the house and the Gulf of Thailand stretches to the horizon at this fully staffed hilltop home on Koh Samui’s northwest coast. Loungers on the terrace waits expectantly for sunset, and steps over the pool lead to a play pavilion with a pool table. Drive 4 minutes downhill to quiet Laem Noi Beach or 9 minutes to everything from coffee to pizza in Nathon.

 Your holiday begins with an airport transfer and includes access to a gym along with staff services. Active guests can perfect their serve on the private tennis court; everyone else can perfect their tan on the loungers and in the pool. After watching the sunset over dinner from the barbecue, head inside to the home theater and wet bar, or challenge friends and family around the pool table.

 This luxury property is bright and airy, thanks to an open-concept layout, blond-wood floors, crisp white walls, and glass panels framing sea views. Open the doors to the terrace to let the breeze waft over a generous sectional in the sitting area and a dining table for 12. Though chef service is included in your stay, there is a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.

 Each of the six bedrooms at this vacation rental has a king bed and en-suite bathroom; several also have a furnished private balcony or lounge area. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms are simple yet stunning, with soaring ceilings, streamlined furnishings, and massive stone bathtubs.

 The villa is less than a 5-minute drive from the nearest beach, but there are plenty more choices just a little farther away, from Mae Nam Beach, where you’ll find both families playing in the sand and couples on honeymoon, to ever-popular Bophut Beach. Be sure to stop by Nathon on Saturday nights for a pedestrian market on the waterfront plaza.

 Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Discover some of the best ocean views on Koh Samui at Samujana Eleven B. Set on a hillside overlooking the bay and designed to take full advantage of the vantage point, this modern vacation rental also seamlessly blends indoor and outdoor living spaces for views from nearly every room. Let the Samujana staff shuttle you to nearby beaches and attractions or arrange excursions for groups of friends and family, from children’s classes to yacht charters.

Watch the sun move across the lush hillsides and boats ply the bay from the shaded sitting area on the villa’s private terrace or the sunny lounge area by the infinity pool. Try your own hand at cooking local produce on the barbecue in the outdoor kitchen, or ask one of the Samujana chefs to prepare something for you to enjoy at the open-air dining area. Pair the meal with a selection from the wine fridge, and set the mood with the sound system. Your holiday includes breakfast and an airport transfer, and services such as spa treatments or a driver can be arranged through the estate.

The Samujana villas were designed by Gary Fell of GFAB Architects to be extensions of the landscapes, with covered terraces that blend into rock outcrops and groves of trees, and rooftops covered in planters and natural stone. This thoughtful approach is continued throughout Eleven B, whether in a living room with open-sided walls and built-in sectionals or in the dining area, which features relaxed wicker chairs. The fully equipped kitchen conceals everything you’ll need behind glossy flat-fronted cabinets that make a minimalist statement.

Each of the three bedrooms at Eleven B is its own luxury haven, with a king bed and en-suite bathroom. Linger in the bedrooms’ lounge areas or step out onto your own terrace for some private stargazing. Touches like wood benches and colorful artwork add warmth to the sleek spaces.

Guests of Samujana enjoy exclusive access to the estate’s private beach, as well as complimentary shuttle service from the Plai Laem area to the family-friendly Choeng Mon Beach or the livelier scene at Chaweng Beach. Stay on the property and have staff arrange an in-villa massage, class or personal training session. Or discover the area’s vibrant shopping and dining, book a yacht and see how many secret coves you can find on a honeymoon-worthy expedition, try out scuba diving or ziplining, or tee off at one of two nearby golf courses. If you’ve come to Thailand to celebrate a special occasion, Samujana has a beautiful lawn and event space for tropical weddings, family reunions, birthday and anniversary parties or yoga retreats.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Enjoy hotel-worthy amenities in a private setting at Rom Trai at Samsara. Part of the exclusive Samsara Estate, the villa is staffed by a live-in chef and housekeeper, as well as concierge and security teams. The four-bedroom property’s airy contemporary interiors are rivaled by beautiful outdoor living areas with views across Nakalay Bay.

Your stay at Rom Trai starts with a round-trip airport transfer and includes chef and housekeeping service. The waterfront villa has an infinity pool for lounging and a lap pool for exercise, a jetted tub and a large terrace with sitting and dining areas and a barbecue. Set the mood with indoor and outdoor sound systems, relax in the sauna and steam room, mix cocktails at the bar and entertain a crowd with a television, DVD player, library and Wi-Fi. For convenience, the villa has an elevator and baby equipment is available on request.

The villa’s peaked roof and glass walls make for airy living spaces, and clean-lined furnishings add contemporary flair. A pair of tuxedo sofas and a Persian rug create a surprisingly cozy sitting area in the open living room, while woven chairs at the dining table and breakfast bar are a light touch of tropical style. A tucked-away library and television room are more intimate spaces for relaxing, and the fully equipped kitchen is likewise hidden behind the dining room.

Each of the four bedrooms at Rom Trai has a king bed and looks out over the ocean, providing a constant reminder that you’re by the beach. Two of the bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms access to a private terrace; one of the terraces has its own jetted tub. The other two bedrooms share both a bathroom and a terrace with a jetted tub.

Plan on a 40-minute drive from Phuket International Airport to the villa. Once you’ve arrived at Samsara Estate, it’s a 5-minute drive to the clinic and town at Kamala, an 8-minute drive to dining and tennis at the Novotel Resort and a 10-minute drive to the Patong gym and grocery store. The golf course at the Phuket Country Club is 14 km away by car, the Bangkok Phuket Hospital, 16 km away. With several beaches neighboring the estate within a 10- to 20-minute walk, you’ll have plenty of shore to explore.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

feature.p: Rom Trai is one of a select handful of private residences located within the Samsara Estate. Few, if any, private enclaves in the world match the unsurpassed luxury and privacy of Samsara. Straddling a secluded peninsula, it is a stunning juxtaposition of rocky shoreline, tropical gardens, and calming blue waters. Perched dramatically between 40 to 60 meters above sea level, these oceanfront villas offer spectacular panoramic views to the west and north over the Andaman Sea and Nakalay beach and to the south across Patong Bay.

listing.listing_description:
Well known for its world-class beachfront environment, Phuket is quickly becoming one of the world’s most prestigious vacation destinations. From Signature Villa’s ocean-view terrace, you’ll have privacy provided by lush tropical greenery. Your entertainment will be the sun setting over the Andaman Sea. And, if you decide to venture beyond Trisara’s beautiful estate walls, you’ll find everything from small fishing villages and nature preserves to bustling cities and adventure tourism opportunities. With two king en-suite bedrooms, both with amazing ocean views, this villa is perfect for a small family, couples retreat, or sun-kissed honeymoon vacation.

Decorated in ultra-luxurious fashion, Trisara Signature Pool Villa - 2 Bedroom is a classic example of the tropical-chic oceanside homes, for which Phuket is known. Mixing warm wood tones with an all-white color scheme creates a relaxing balance between form and function. The furniture is all designer. The electronics are state of the art. In the kitchen, high-end appliances will inspire your inner chef.

At dinner, there’s a beautiful dining room inside with seating for eight, or you could dine outside under the stars at the alfresco set on the terrace. After dinner, there are several lounge areas and living spaces outside, all with great views of the Andaman Sea. There’s also a swimming pool, barbecue, and sun beds on the terrace. Back inside, features like Wi-Fi, television, air conditioning, and a washer/dryer will provide the comforts of home.

If there’s a golfer in your group, Laguna Phuket Golf Course is a must-play for those who love challenging fairways with ocean views. Recently named “Asia’s Best Golf Course” by the World Golf Awards, this course makes the most of Phuket’s gorgeous environment with its peaks, valleys, and coastal features. If the city is more your style, head across the Island to Phuket Town and enjoy their bustling markets, beach bars, and vibrant nightlife.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Malee Sai is a rare blend of colonial elegance and contemporary style, with an expansive open-plan design that really makes the best of its sensational surroundings. Occupying prime position on a private oceanfront estate bordering Natai Beach, this beautiful beachfront villa enjoys panoramic views of one of Thailand’s most pristine bays. It’s an excellent choice for families, groups and wedding parties who want to escape the often-crowded beaches on Phuket.

It's easy to switch into vacation mode as you drift between the pool, outdoor pavilions and air-conditioned rooms, constantly connected to the fabulous sea views. The villa comes with two maids and a private chef overseen by an estate manager to deal with individual requests, meaning every need is easily catered for and total comfort is guaranteed. Take tea on the lawn or stroll on the beach. If you crave entertainment, you can choose a blockbuster from the movie collection or listen to your favorite tunes throughout the house.

Driftwood sculptures and local art add interest to the subtle décor. A spacious family room sits to the left of the entrance while a fully fitted western kitchen and spacious, glass-walled sea view dining space occupy the lower floor of a pavilion to the right. All the ground floor rooms slide open onto the villa's generous saltwater infinity pool, which is bordered by a teak sundeck with designer loungers positioned poolside for days soaking up the tropical sun. The garden at the rear will take you on a journey of discovery, ending with a game of petanque at the finish. Out front, a furnished beachside relaxation pavilion offers the perfect spot to enjoy the spectacular sunsets as you indulge in a barbecue, fresh from the grill.

The villa boasts six spacious bedrooms - three on the upper level and three poolside. Two of the three master bedrooms are ocean facing suites with floor to ceiling windows and terraces offering stunning sea views. The guest rooms also include two twins, ideal for older children while the study bedroom has a large, comfortable king bed.

When you’re not swimming, sunbathing or enjoying carefree strolls on the beach, you might want to indulge in a massage or play badminton. Further afield is Phuket Town, an hour’s drive, and the international airport is just 27 km away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Spend an idyllic holiday on the shores of one of Koh Samui’s quietest beaches at Baan Wanora. Set amid lush gardens and tranquil water features, this beautiful oceanfront vacation rental makes a picturesque backdrop for a tropical getaway with friends or family. Its six bedrooms and attentive staff offer total relaxation to parties of up to thirteen.

Your stay at Baan Wanora includes a round-trip airport transfer, daily Western and Asian breakfast, and private chef service. Soak in the tropical sun in outdoor living areas with an adults’ pool with a swim-up bar, children’s pool and plenty of loungers, plus waterfalls and fish ponds. Other amenities range from an indoor bar and games collection to satellite television and Wi-Fi.

The villa’s gorgeous open-sided living areas make the most of the warm weather and ocean views. Spread out in open-concept living and dining areas, where a cathedral ceiling and Buddha statue are classic Thai touches, or take coffee and chats out onto the shaded veranda. While chef service is included in your stay, the villa does have a kitchen with a microwave, blender, coffee machine and more.

This luxury property has four bedrooms with king beds, including two master suites, and one bedroom with a queen bed; all five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, mini-bars and ocean views. The sixth bedroom has two twin beds and adjoins another room with a twin bed as well as an en-suite bathroom, making it perfect for children and a nanny.

With the white sands of Laem Sor just in front of Baan Wanora, it couldn’t be easier to bring the kids out for a day of building sandcastles or to relive your honeymoon with a stroll by the water. If you’d like to see more of the area, walk down to the ornate Laem Sor Pagoda or make the 10-minute drive to shopping and dining options in the town of Lamai.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Utilizing its breathtaking coastal perch, Villa Solaris captures dynamic ocean views from its birds-eye positioning within the prestigious Amarin Estate on the hillside of Kamala, Phuket. With four king en-suite bedrooms, this pavilion-style vacation home embraces the beautiful natural surroundings of Phuket, incorporating lush greenery, mature palms, and ocean views into its decor at every opportunity. From its convenient location, guests of Solaris will have access to Phuket’s best beachfront, golf, shopping, dining, and nightlife, all within a few minutes drive.

Floor-to-ceiling windows and openings seamlessly merge indoor and outdoor spaces to create a soothing, open-air atmosphere throughout Solaris’ elegant interior. Designed with traditional Thai architecture in mind, Solaris adds in a touch of modern luxury with high-end electronics, designer furniture, and the most lavish fixtures and finishings. Throughout the interior, you’ll appreciate an eclectic collection of local art, as well as contemporary pieces that are sure to spark conversation. And, whether you’re planning a group gather or looking to break away for more intimate moments, Solaris has plenty of spacious and secluded seating areas for both.

Villa Solaris comes with a full staff, consisting of a housekeeper, private cook, security guard, villa manager, and airport-transfer, to help make your stay even more relaxing. Features like Wi-Fi and the home theatre will help keep you connected, should you desire. Outside, the three infinity swimming pools, sun loungers, and amazing ocean views will provide the rest, relaxation, and rejuvenation that only a beach vacation can offer.

When it’s time to head to the beach, you’ll have three beautiful options, Kamala, Patong, and Surin, all of which are within ten kilometers of Solaris. If there’s a golfer in the group, Red Mountain and Laguna are two of Thailand’s best courses, both offering incredible views as you meander through their winding tropical fairways. After, reward yourself with a night on the town. Start in Old Phuket with some boutique shopping and traditional Thai cuisine.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Designed to embrace Phuket’s gorgeous environment, this ocean-facing luxury villa captures outstanding views of the Andaman Sea, while its wide terrace doors invite fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight. With three well-adorned king en-suite bedrooms, Trisara Signature Pool Villa - 3 Bedroom is perfect for a family vacation, couples retreat, or a golf trip with friends. Nearby, you’ll find some of Phuket’s most coveted beachfront areas, golf courses, and national parks.

Phuket’s beach villa architecture is well known for its open-air approach to design. Mixing traditional influence with modern luxuries and open concept layouts creates a serene atmosphere, perfect for relaxing in seclusion, or hosting friends for an unforgettable evening. The villa makes great use of its vaulted ceilings and wide openings to punctuate the spacious feeling in the living room. Designer furniture, high-end electronics, and authentic Thai works of art decorate the sleek and stylish interior, adding a touch of elegance and excitement to the soothing beach environment.

Enjoying ocean views from Trisara Signature Pool Villa - 3 Bedroom’s terrace is easy from its many vantage points. The infinity pool, living and dining areas, and sun loungers are all positioned for scenic views of the Andaman Sea. Inside, Wi-Fi, television, and a media room will help keep guests connected. And, Trisara Signature Pool Villa - 3 Bedroom comes with shared access to Trisara’s private beachfront, tennis courts, fitness facilities, swimming pools, and bars.

Recently named “Asia’s Best Golf Course” by the World Golf Awards, Laguna Phuket Golf Course has been racking up such praise for many years. If there’s a golf aficionado in your group, this is a must-play. Soaring ocean views, lush tropical greenery, and challenging fairways make Laguna an instant favorite for golfers of any skill level. After a morning on the golf course, cool off at one of the many surrounding beachfront areas, several are within ten kilometers.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Step out of your every day and into the serenity of your next holiday home! Step in into tropical luxury at the Lotus Beach Villa. Relax in comfort and style in a beach retreat that commands magnificent views of Koh Phangan and the Gulf of Thailand, inspired by a design that ignites a passion for living and an indulgence for ultimate comfort. Enjoy the luxury of generous indoor living and outdoor terraces, affording private spaces for reflection and rest and common areas for dining, relaxation, exercise, games and family fun.

Rest

Refresh your body and soul over a good sleep in any one of the villa’s 5 well-appointed bedrooms, each with adjoining bathrooms. A retreat in itself, the master bedroom’s cool and earthy tones is very spacious offering adjoining space with a desk and a wall of books for good holiday reading. Adjoining this is a large indoor and outdoor bathroom that combines natural textures of sandstone, granite and terrazzo giving it its own distinct character.

There are 4 other guest suites that offer unparalleled comfort, each with adjoining bathroom. Each suite offers generous space in colours and design that ignites relaxation, comfort and fun. All bedroom suites are fully air-conditioned and come with the finest linen and towelling, comfortable latex topped mattresses, flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and electronic safes.

Eat

The Lotus Beach Villa's beachfront pavilion is the soul of the villa. Home to the dining room and kitchen, it extends it's glass doors to generous terrace spaces for dining, lounging and playing. This glassed space has a large dining table, a marble breakfast counter and modern fully-equipped kitchen. Teak-framed swivel and sliding doors open up to a beachfront terrace and the villa's pool and jacuzzi. The resort's 25-meter beachfront pool is only a few steps away. Khun Oh is the villa's private chef who has won the hearts (and tummies!) of all our guests with her delicious cuisine and creative presentation.

Lounge

Bordered by a shallow pond, the living room with its high vaulted ceiling is a perfect air-conditioned option for indoor lounging and relaxation. Surrounded by glass windows and doors, one still feels part of the outdoors even within the confines of this comfortable room. There are many terraces around the villa that also offers private spaces for lounging, reading and getting together. You will be spoilt for option.

Refresh

Awaken your senses and replenish your energy with a massage treatment in the villa’s spa room directly accessible through floating sandstone step through the villa’s children’s pool. And for those of you who prefer an outdoor massage, there is a massage sala awaiting you in the outdoor terrace.

Play

Want more out of your every day besides swimming? The villa offers many options to cater for many preferences. Stay fit, relaxed and entertained throughout your stay. The villa’s gym has Life Cycle fitness equipment that includes a Cross Trainer, Treadmill, Recumbent Bike and a corner for weights. Too chilled to exercise? Want to satisfy your restless spirit? Enjoy a game of Ping Pong on our outdoor verandah, or perhaps a game of pool? Or even an indoor game Foosball in our games room. There are also a number of board games to choose from for a tropical games night.

listing.listing_description:
Samujana One, part of the exclusive community of Samujana luxury properties, is a five-bedroom contemporary villa on the island of Koh Sumai in Thailand. With stunning views of the Gulf of Thailand and the dreamy surrounding islands, and ample spaces for indoor/outdoor relaxation and entertainment, it's the ideal vacation rental for relishing exquisite privacy among family and friends in one of most beautiful locations in Southeast Asia.

The villa features serene, expansive views of the Gulf of Thailand from its large pool terrace, alfresco living area, and bedroom balconies. You'll enjoy long, tropical afternoons floating in the salt-water infinite swimming pool, sunbathing on poolside loungers, and relaxing in the charming sala pavilion. In the evening, withdraw into the villa's lovely indoor/outdoor open-plan living area, where you'll sip cocktails in the sumptuous lounge on the crescent-shaped sofa, and dine at the elegant table for ten. The fully equipped kitchen features a breakfast bar and ocean views—ideal for preparing delicious Thai meals and serving up cocktails to family and friends. With plentiful outdoor lighting, you can relish the ocean breeze deep into the night.

The villa's cool interior includes wonderful amenities for relaxation, entertainment, and fitness. The movie room with projector features deluxe, cascading couches, ideal for watching movies together in utter comfort. There's also a large indoor lounge with flat screen TV and curtained glass doors opening to the pool terrace. A surround-sound system and ping-pong table will keep you entertained, while air conditioning and fans will keep you cool. To refresh your body after a long night, the well-appointed fitness room will inspire you with ocean-view doors opening to the fresh morning air.

The villa's five bedrooms all feature ocean views, private terrace access, sumptuous king size beds, and ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone showers and large bathtubs. Each room is wonderfully luminous and full of ocean light, making them perfect for private downtime and sweet, slumberous nights.

Samujana One is perfectly situated for enjoying the paradisal beauty of Koh Samui. You're just minutes from both Choeng Mon Beach and Chaweng Beach, and a ten-mile drive to Koh Samui Rainforest. For golf, Bohput Hills Golfclub and Santiburi Samui Country Club are just a short drive away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Great views, resort-worthy amenities and an attentive staff are all part of the experience at Villa Enjoy. This perfectly named Phuket vacation rental is ideal for adventurous groups of friends or an active family, and its Patong location puts you close to beaches, shopping, dining and more. Five bedrooms and sleek, sophisticated interiors can welcome up to ten guests in contemporary luxury.

Your holiday at Villa Enjoy includes the services of a chef, butler, housekeeper and property manager. Features like a huge swimming pool, rooftop plunge pool, badminton court, plus exercise, boxing and game rooms cater to the active; for everyone else, there are outdoor lounging and dining areas with beautiful views, Apple TV and Wi-Fi.

Walls of glass mean you can also enjoy the views of Patong and the surrounding hills from the villa’s spacious open-concept interiors. The heart of the home is a great room with a sitting area, dining table for twelve and a fully equipped kitchen, but you’ll find the same modern furnishings, luxe textures and vibrant artwork both here and in the rest of the villa.

Villa Enjoy has three bedrooms with queen beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with a lounge area and private balcony, as well as two bedrooms with king beds. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and ceiling fans, and open to an outdoor space.

Not only do the villa’s amenities offer plenty of entertainment, its Kathu location makes it easy to reach some of the best of Phuket’s beaches, shopping, dining, golf and more. It’s just a short drive to Patong Beach and a little farther to Karon Beach for a day on the sand, and at night, it’s well worth making the short trip into downtown Patong for dinner or a drink.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Holiday dreams come true at Baan Mika. This exquisite Koh Samui vacation rental is set on the white sands of Plai Laem Beach, offering views to the hills across the sea along with five-star service and luxury amenities. It’s a stunning backdrop for a relaxed stay with family, a milestone celebration with friends or even a destination wedding in a tropical idyll.

Your stay begins with an airport transfer to the villa, where you’ll be welcomed with fresh fruit and flowers. Daily continental breakfast is included, as are the services of a Thai chef, villa manager and housekeeper. Spend blissful days lounging by the swimming pool, trying local fare on the barbecue or snacking at the al-fresco dining table for twelve, followed by laid-back nights in front of the satellite TVs and surround-sound system.

Baan Mika feels like your own private resort, laid out in pavilions around the swimming pool and facing the sea. You’ll want to spend most of your time in the shade of the open-sided living and dining areas, but there’s also a dining room and fully equipped kitchen that can be enclosed with glass walls if you’d like.

The villa’s six bedrooms are honeymoon-worthy retreats with en-suite bathrooms, lounge areas and access to the pool terrace. There are two bedrooms with king beds and four bedrooms with two twin beds each; several also have al-fresco showers.

A stay at Baan Mika puts the white sands of Plai Laem right at your doorstep—just descend the stairs to put your feet in the shallows. It’s also a short drive from three other popular beaches, including Chaweng Beach, as well as local attractions like the Big Buddha and the shops and eateries of Fisherman’s Village in Bophut. Golfers will appreciate the two golf courses within easy reach.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Perched on the outermost plot of the Samsara peninsula, Villa Leelavadee strikes a beautiful balance between graceful grandeur and classic Asian design. This home successfully combines elegance with rich furnishings and spine-tingling views over Patong Harbor. Panoramic wraparound outdoor decks frame a 14-meter infinity-edge pool which dissolves into the Andaman Sea. Glass panels along the pool’s bottom look into the rooms below.

The villa includes a fully equipped home exercise room, games room, projection television room, and built-in sauna. A private outdoor jetted tub adjoins the master bedroom – perfect for a late evening soak by moonlight. A spacious outdoor dining area, built-in barbecue, and poolside sunning areas complement the outdoor decking.

The interior and exterior of the property are traditional Thai in style, transporting you to an oasis of tropical serene. The villa is serviced by full time, live-in staff consisting of one cook and one housekeeper. Trained to anticipate your needs, they’ll look after you with an infectious blend of Thai graciousness and charm. The estate’s manager and front office team complement the villa’s permanent staff, and are available to provide an unmatched level of truly personal service throughout your stay. Picture yourself enjoying a delicious Thai meal in the evening while you look out over the ocean and chat about your day with your loved ones. If you do want to use the kitchen yourself during your stay, you’ll find everything you need to cater for your breakfast, lunch or dinner.

Leelavadee at Samsara has five bedrooms in total, all of which have an unobscured view of the ocean. Four of the rooms have en-suite facilities and all are air conditioned to ensure a comfortable night’s sleep. The master bedroom has its own private veranda with jetted tub for the ultimate in vacation relaxation.

Away from the villa, there’s plenty to see and do in nearby Kamala, and of course Phuket. There are beaches just a short walk away with unblemished sands and gentle breezes that let you know you truly are in your own little part of paradise. If you’re feeling active, there’s a gym, tennis courts and golf course all within easy reach of the property so you can work up an appetite before heading out on the town in Phuket or just savoring a delicious meal back at Leelavadee at Samsara. Look forward to a terrific Thai vacation.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All Rights Reserved.

feature.p: Leelavadee is one of a select handful of private residences located within the Samsara Estate. Few, if any, private enclaves in the world match the unsurpassed luxury and privacy of Samsara. Straddling a secluded peninsula, it is a stunning juxtaposition of rocky shoreline, tropical gardens, and calming blue waters. Perched dramatically between 40 to 60 meters above sea level, these oceanfront villas offer spectacular panoramic views to the west and north over the Andaman Sea and Nakalay beach and to the south across Patong Bay.

listing.listing_description:
Approached by a private driveway and surrounded by wide, lawned tropical beachside gardens, Baan Taley Rom offers guests an attractive, modern and very private luxury residence with stunning views from almost every room out across the glittering waters of Andaman Sea.

An ideal choice for large families or groups of friends looking for the ultimate beach house; the villa boasts 60 metres of undisturbed beach frontage and offers an appealing combination of in- and outdoor spaces to relax, get active, dine or party in an exclusive private setting. The beachfront lawn is also perfectly suited to private functions, making the villa an excellent choice for an oceanside wedding.

Baan Taley Rom's generous living, dining and recreation rooms are all fully and comfortably furnished. A long, covered terrace provides ample opportunity for al fresco meals and social gatherings, while three guest bedrooms open onto a covered first floor balcony, which allows for plenty of incredible sunset photo opportunities.

Spacious open-plan room designs with polished wooden floors and a warm colour scheme lend a welcoming, homely atmosphere to the interiors. Outside in the beachside garden, the villa's 25-metre, black-tiled infinity swimming pool forms a dramatic centrepiece, complemented by a separate gym and spa pavilion for the ultimate private resort experience.

listing.listing_description:
Host an idyllic family reunion, celebrate a milestone anniversary or gather for an incredible tropical destination wedding at the expansive Villa Kalyana. As well appointed as any luxury boutique hotel, this fully staffed twenty-six-bedroom estate is your own private resort on the south shore of Koh Samui, just steps from the white sands of Laem Sor Beach.

Your holiday at Villa Kalyana includes the services of the property’s full staff as well as those of a private chef. The estate opens to extensive beachfront living areas with a pool, lounging and dining spaces, barbecue deck and hammocks under palm trees. In the evenings, gather in the games room, watch a favorite movie in the entertainment center or share photos of your stay via Wi-Fi.

The villa’s open-sided pavilions make it easy to fully enjoy the balmy weather. High ceilings, ornately carved panels and traditional artwork nod to classic Thai style in the living and dining rooms, while plenty of seating options ensure your comfort. In addition to the fully equipped kitchen for guests’ use, there is also a kitchen exclusively for staff use.

This vacation rental is divided into an Orchid Wing with eight king bedrooms and two bedrooms with twin bunk beds, a Lotus Wing with nine king bedrooms and one bedroom with four bunk beds, and a Garden Wing with five king bedrooms and one bedroom with two twin bunk beds. All bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, and several are honeymoon-worthy bungalows with their own kitchenettes and living areas.

Take advantage of the villa’s beachfront location and spend lazy days on the sand or in the water, playing with the provided volleyball and badminton sets or taking the snorkeling equipment out. If you’d like to see more of the area, check out nearby Lamai and Nikki beaches or take a day trip to Na Muang Safari Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located on the southern tip of Koh Samui, the most tranquil part of the island, you’ll be welcomed with the sounds of nature and the rippling sea. The peaceful, open-concept property features private access to Laem Sor Beach just steps from the backyard. Each room, designed with a minimal aesthetic, offers full ocean views. Grab a pair of kayaks and paddle along the shimmering turquoise shoreline.

The pavilion is furnished with modern décor, including plump sofas, artful accents, and handcrafted wooden furniture. Expansive sliding glass doors open from the living space onto the patio, allowing one to flow into the other. Swaying palm trees, frangipani, and exotic shrubbery are planted throughout the manicured garden. A refreshing infinity pool, tiled to imitate the hue of the surf beyond, invites you to dive in on scorching afternoons. The covered terrace is a serene spot to sit, relax, and sip a morning coffee while watching the vibrant sunrise. 

Nestled amongst unspoiled nature, you’ll feel like you’re miles away from tourist attractions yet are just a short drive from the Town of Nathon; get your souvenir shopping done, try a taste of authentic Thai street fare at the Night Food Market, and peruse the picturesque seafront plaza. Buddhist temple Wat Plai Laem is a must-see day trip destination, as well as Chaweng Beach and Na Muang Safari Park. Channel your inner cowboy and try a guided horseback riding trek along the coast.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Part of the exclusive community of Samujana luxury properties on the island of Koh Sumai in Thailand, the four-bedroom villa Samujana Twenty-Seven features heavenly views of the Gulf of Thailand, expansive outdoor and indoor spaces for relaxation and entertainment, and exquisite design details that invite you to relish the beauty around you and discovery the tranquility within you.

Enjoy long days of delicious sun on the terrace, bathing in the infinite swimming pool and gazing out at the panoramic view of azure ocean and verdant islands. In the afternoon, withdraw into the villa's beautiful indoor/outdoor living area, where the elegant lounge is perfect of meditative relaxation, and the beautiful dining table awaits you for sumptuous feasts in the gentle breeze. The fully equipped kitchen, overlooking the lounge and dining table, is the ideal laboratory for the Thai chefs among you, and there's even a gas grill for barbeque. Exquisite and charming decorative touches enhance the feeling of voluptuous peace.

In addition to the ample indoor/outdoor living area, the villa features an indoor lounge with cozy furnishings and TV, perfect for movie-watching at night. There's also a well-equipped fitness center, an office space, and a rooftop terrace.

With four bedrooms that sleep eight, the villa is the perfect vacation rental for families, groups of friends, and destination wedding guests. The four serene bedrooms all feature private access to the outdoor terrace through large glass doors. Three of the bedrooms have king beds, one has two twin beds, and all have ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone shower and bathtub. The master bedroom includes its own lounge area. With ceiling fans, TVs, and perfectly cozy bedding, the villa's bedrooms invite you to delicious privacy and peace at any time of day or night.

At Samujana, you're perfectly placed to enjoy nights in downtown Koh Samui and days exploring the island's precious natural treasures. Choeng Mon Beach and Chaweng Beach are both five minutes away, and Koh Samui Rainforest is only ten miles from your door. Golfers will enjoy Bohput Hills Golf Club and Santiburi Samui Country Club, both a short drive away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Nestled in the tropical jungle of Koh Samui’s luxurious hillside community, Villa Milla offers unprecedented privacy and an open-air atmosphere like no other. With four en-suite bedrooms, all with access to the terrace, Milla is perfect for a secluded family vacation, golf trip, or retreat. Nearby, you’ll find several beautiful public beaches, golf courses, historical sites, and quaint fishing villages. For a quick intro to Thai culture, visit Big Buddha Temple, just two-kilometers from Milla. There, you’ll find gorgeous views, a beautifully manicured landscape, and the iconic Big Buddha monument, which can be seen as for away as Phuket Town.

Luxuriously adorned with floor-to-ceiling glass, natural stone, and locally sourced wood, Villa Milla’s construction celebrates Thailand’s lush environment, inviting it to flow throughout its interior. Wide doorways and an open-concept floor plan enhance the open-air ambiance, allowing guests and the fresh breeze to move from inside to out, with no barriers. In the living room, plush designer seating, contemporary furniture, and ocean-inspired art decorate the large common area, which encompasses the fully-equipped kitchen, and eight seat dining area.

Hosting is a breeze at Villa Milla, as it is well outfitted with an espresso machine, dishwasher, wine cellar, bar, sound system, and generous lounge areas inside. On the terrace, there’s even more sitting, dining, and lounge space surrounding the infinity pool, all with scenic views of Choeng Mon’s tropical hillside.

The nearest beach to Villa Milla is Choeng Mon, just one-kilometer to the East. Although a favorite among locals and returning visitors, Choeng Mon Beach always feels like a secluded spot you’ve just discovered. With shops and amenities just a short walk up the hill, several beachfront bars and restaurants, you’ll be free to spend as much time on the beach as you desire. If you’ve got a golfer in your midst, Royal Samui and Santiburi golf clubs are both about fifteen kilometers from Milla.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Nestled amongst the luscious green hills of North Chaweng, this six bedroom luxury villa overlooks the Gulf of Thailand. Just minutes from the bustling downtown, Sukham is close enough to come and go easily, yet far enough to maintain relaxing seclusion. And, it’s just a five minute drive from the beautiful sandy shores of Choeng Mon Beach.

In a climate like Thailand, you won’t want to spend much time indoors. Luckily, Sukham’s open-concept living/dining room has full wall length openings on two of its perimeter walls. With fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight filling the interior spaces, its easy to stay connected to nature, even while you’re inside. The kitchen features high-end appliances, retro-modern cabinetry, and a breakfast bar.

Sukham has lots of other great features in and around its walls. Upon arrival, you’ll love the stone walkway through the lily pond. Once your settled, relax in the home theatre and entertainment lounge, or, get competitive in the game room or at the billiards table. Outside, there’s lots of scenic spaces to sit, eat, or lounge on the terrace. The infinity swimming pool is the perfect place to spend an afternoon looking out over the Gulf of Thailand. Also included with rental you’ll have a private chef, maid service, and daily breakfast.

All six of Sukham’s bedrooms feature king sized beds, en-suite bathrooms, and direct access to the terrace or balcony. The three bedrooms on the upper floor also come with a spectacular view of the Gulf of Thailand.

Just a few kilometres away you’ll find the main street of Chaweng. Stop in for some great local cuisine, shopping, and nightlife. The Fisherman’s Village is a great place to visit if you love fresh seafood. And, if there’s a golfer in your group, Bophut Hills and Royal Samui Golf Clubs are just a few minutes from the villa.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Suited to large families or a festive group of friends, twenty-eight is ideal for any special occasion. Built on the highest tier of the Samujana estate, this private luxury villa boasts unmatched ocean views from its many different social spaces. Six beautiful bedrooms, all with ocean views, make it easy to accommodate up to twelve guests for an amazing Thai vacation.

Whether it’s a quiet night in or a merry get together, you’ll find the right space with ease. The games room, entertainment lounge, and private cinema feature an extensive collection of videogame systems, DVDs, and television options. Outside on the terrace you can enjoy lounging and dining spaces, all surrounding the infinity pool. At meal time there’s both an indoor and an outdoor kitchen, to suit your formal or alfresco dining desires.

The spaces at Twenty-Eight are dynamic. Cozy lounge chairs, modern designer furniture, eclectic artwork, and large social areas provide guests with many options for how to spend your time. Muted tones, floor to ceiling windows, and the merging of indoor and outdoor spaces allow the vibrant natural colors of the environment to leap to the forefront of your attention from any spot on the property. The fully equipped kitchen features high end appliances, plenty of counter top work space, and an open concept design, making it a great social space as well.

All but one of the six bedrooms features a king sized bed, while the sixth, with two twin beds, is great for kids. Each one of the bedrooms has its own ensuite bathroom, rain shower, bathtub, bidet, private terrace, and ocean view.

Just minutes away from the villa you’ll find boutique shops, fine dining, and nightlife on Main Street. If you’re looking for an adventure, the Ko Samui Rainforest is just ten miles away, or take in a round of golf at the notably scenic Bohput Hills Golf Club.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
With a waterfront setting, personalized service and contemporary architecture, Saengootsa at Samsara is the perfect villa for travelers who don’t want to compromise. During your stay, you’ll enjoy chef and housekeeping service, inviting outdoor living areas and beaches a short walk away. Designed by the architect of the Samsara Estate as a private getaway, the five-bedroom villa is a beautiful, light-filled setting for your tropical escape.

Your stay at Saengootsa includes airport transfers and chef, housekeeping, concierge and security service. The villa is designed to let you enjoy the beautiful waterfront setting, with an infinity pool surrounded by chaise longues and a shady sala, a covered outdoor dining area and outdoor kitchen with barbecue. Private terraces and jetted tubs are the perfect places for sunset cocktails or watching the stars. In the evenings, set the mood with the indoor and outdoor sound systems, relax in the media room, gather at the bar and pool table in the games room or catch up in the office or via Wi-Fi.

The villa uses polished concrete, pale wood paneling and plenty of glass to industrial-chic effect. Tucked under a lofty peaked roof and surrounded by sliding doors, the open-concept living areas take on a bright, casually luxurious feel. Low-slung sectionals and benches have minimalist appeal, while suede upholstery and warm neutral tones soften the contemporary lines. There’s room for everyone on the living room’s cube-like sofas, and the dining room’s counter-like table can seat the whole group. Cooks will appreciate both the TV and the sea views from the fully equipped open kitchen.

Thanks to the waterfront location of Saengootsa, each of its five bedrooms has a sea view. The master bedroom has a king bed, en-suite bathroom and access to a private terrace with a jetted tub, and a second bedroom has a king bed, en-suite bathroom and access to a private terrace with tub. A third bedroom has a queen bed, two twin Murphy beds and an en-suite bathrooms. The fourth and fifth bedrooms each have two twin beds and share a terrace with a tub; one has an en-suite bathroom and the other has access to a hallway bathroom.

Since Saengootsa is on a stretch of rocky shoreline, guests in search of sand can make the 10- to 20-minute walk to neighboring beaches. From the villa, it’s a 5-minute drive to the clinic and town at Kamala, an 8-minute drive to restaurants and a tennis court at the Novotel Resort and a 10-minute drive to the Patong gym and grocery store. You’ll find the golf course at the Phuket Country Club a 14 km drive away, Bangkok Phuket Hospital a 30-minute drive away, and a church and Phuket International Airport a 27 km drive away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

feature.p: Saengootsa is one of a select handful of private residences located within the Samsara Estate. Few, if any, private enclaves in the world match the unsurpassed luxury and privacy of Samsara. Straddling a secluded peninsula, it is a stunning juxtaposition of rocky shoreline, tropical gardens, and calming blue waters. Perched dramatically between 40 to 60 meters above sea level, these oceanfront villas offer spectacular panoramic views to the west and north over the Andaman Sea and Nakalay beach and to the south across Patong Bay.

listing.listing_description:
The Samujana Estate in Koh Samui is home to beautiful Thai inspired luxury villas. Built on a hillside overlooking the ocean, this vacation rental is positioned perfectly for capturing the sunrise. With golf, city life, and shared access to the estate’s private beachfront, villa Nineteen is a great home base for your Thai holiday.

Surrounded by lush green vegetation and fresh ocean breeze, Nineteen’s open atmosphere integrates Thailand’s natural environment seamlessly. This multi-tiered villa is designed with sleek straight sight lines, making use of the hillside to build up, rather than deep, optimizing the number of spaces with ocean views. The living areas, both inside and out, are minimalistic and sophisticated. Brightly coloured designer furniture creates a contrast with the neutral tones of the villa’s interior. Wood and stone accent walls are found throughout the living room and bedrooms, adding character to each unique space. The kitchen follows suit, sleek and stylish, equipped with high end appliances. Red cabinetry, to match the couch, sets the kitchen area apart, giving it a different ambience within the open concept floor plan.

Inside the villa you’ll find formal dining for six, an espresso machine, wine fridge, sound system, Wi-Fi, television, and more. Included with rental, there’s daily housekeeping, airport transfer, and breakfast. Out on the terrace, sun beds, loungers, and living areas surround the infinity pool. And, for an even better ocean view, pour yourself a glass of wine and head up to the balcony to gaze upon the endless sea.

Each of the four bedrooms are identical in their features. King beds, ensuites with showers, bathtubs, and bidets, lounge areas, and access to a private terrace make it easy for everyone to have their own personal oasis.

If you feel like exploring the area, the Ko Samui Rainforest, Bohput Hills Golf Club, and Choeng Mon Beach are all just a few minutes drive from Samujana’s estate. Each option is a great way to appreciate Thailand’s dynamic environment.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
*Please note that this property is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project.

Sip your morning tea beneath the shady lemon tree in this modern Thai villa’s secluded backyard. Catch up on some reading while the kids play in the shallow area of the 8-meter pool. At sunset, sit down for an alfresco dinner followed by cocktails in the covered lounge by the pool’s end. Or, you could have those drinks at a bustling bar in the Bangla Night Plaza, 20-km from home.

Outlined with lush hedges and tall palm trees, Villa Shyine is a quiet escape, just a few minutes from Bang Tao Beach. Inside, you’ll feel the beach’s breezy influence with floor-to-ceiling openings, a soothing color palette, and natural wood tones. When you’re in the mood to relax, stream a series in the living room, stretch out in a sunbed, or unwind in the hot tub. If you’re feeling a little rowdy, turn up the sound system, grill up some fresh seafood on the barbecue, and blend a fun tropical beverage to enjoy under a palm tree. On extra-special occasions, bring in a private chef and try some authentic Thai cuisine.

When you feel like dining out, the restaurants that line the winding streets of Old Town Phuket are always exciting options. Rather try a few different things? Head to food stalls at Talad Kaset Night Market and get the full spectrum of local favorites. Before you leave, make sure to snap a few vacation photos at Wat Chalong Temple.

listing.listing_description:
This stunning luxury villa is located within Trisara Resort on the west coast of Phuket. The 650-square meter home is situated on a lush private estate with expansive views of he Andaman Sea from virtually every living space. Its design combines high-end contemporary appliances, vintage Thai elegance, and natural materials that harmonize with the enchanting surroundings. Three king bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms accommodate six guests, and additional bedding can be arranged. Your vacation rental includes resort privileges and a dedicated in-villa staff.

Nestled amid aromatic gardens, the villa features an ample teak deck and twenty-meter infinity swimming pool that seems to over above the lush coastal forest and luminous sea. Sun loungers, dining tables, and comfortable salon seating invite you to savor the exquisite daylight and sublime sunsets of Phuket while bathed in the sea-kissed air.

The interior living room comprises a comfortable lounge and a beautiful dining table for eight beside an exquisite Buddhist statue. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances as well as a central table for casual meals. Plentiful windows and glass doors infuse the home with dreamy natural light. The décor is understated yet exquisite, with tasteful touches of vibrant color and original artifacts that summon the spirit of traditional Thailand.

The villa features three ample suites with king beds, one of which can be arranged as two twin beds. Each is a deluxe apartment unto itself, equipped with air conditioning, a TV, and an ensuite bathroom. The master and primary guest suite both include lounge and open to the pool deck, while the third room enjoys a private terrace. Additional bedding for two guests can be made available upon request.

This vacation rental offers a fabulous combination of secluded privacy and convenient proximity to the resort's five-star amenities. Superb restaurants, the renowned Jara Spa, fitness facilities, and the resort's pool and beach are all within walking distance, and several other beaches are within easy reach by car. Golfers are less than seven kilometers from Laguna Phuket Golf Club. Proximity to Phuket International Airport (just ten kilometers away) makes this villa a convenient choice for destination wedding guests.

listing.listing_description:
Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.

Villa Andaman is located in the lush Kathu district of Phuket and offers a private vacation experience alongside the high end amenities of a pristine boutique resort. Overlooking the sparkling oceanfront and sandy beach, you will also be close to watersports options, fine dining and golf. As your five senses align in perfect harmony at this stunning Thai vacation rental, a sixth sense will be born in a magical feeling of sumptuous Zen bliss.

Enjoy a splash in the private 20m infinity swimming pool with a stunning view of the bay. A large alfresco dining pergola with seating for twelve sits at one end of the pool, a garden lounge on the other. The length of the deck is lined with comfortable sun loungers and parasols. Inside, you will find satellite television, Wi-Fi and a sound system. Or how about racking up a few games in the chic billiards room? Your reservation includes housekeeping and chef services as well as complimentary access to the resort’s restaurant and bar, beach services, spa, fitness center, and children’s club.

The open interior features a large living and dining area with a high ceiling, overhead fans and rich textures of wood above, below and throughout the furnishings. The circular dining table includes a lazy Susan, and the living area offers cozy seating around a large coffee table. Ornate Asian showpieces elegantly complement the feng shui of the residence.

Six exquisite bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms accommodate up to twelve adults plus two children at this non-smoking luxury villa. Guests will have their choice of four king size beds, one queen bed and two doubles. All of the suites have televisions and ceiling fans, and there are dual vanities and jetted tubs in two of the bathrooms.

During your stay at Villa Andaman, you will be just a few minutes away from the Phuket FantaSea theme park where you can take in amazing shows featuring acrobats and elephants. You will also be within easy reach of the cafes and restaurants of Surin and the nightlife of Patong. The villa is also an eight minute walk away from Kamala Beach. Villa Andaman makes a great bet for a family holiday or a special event like a wedding or anniversary. Book your stay today with Luxury Retreats!
